content: I have been trying to get in the Air Force for a few months. I have failed a hearing test in my left ear three times now. They have sent my papers to Texas to see if they can be signed off on- has anybody ever been through this and can give me a heads up if I will be able to get in the AIR FORCE? I am desperate- please help!!
reply: I have been trying to get in the Air Force for a few months. I have failed a hearing test in my left ear three times now. They have sent my papers to Texas to see if they can be signed off on- has anybody ever been through this and can give me a heads up if I will be able to get in the AIR FORCE? I am desperate- please help!!
title: HEARING TEST PROBLEMS-HELP!!

content: Failing the hearing test three times doesn't give you many options. It may depend on what you want to do in the Air Force. If good hearing is not crucial for the postion you are interested in, you may have a chance. Don't get your hopes up! I wish I had better news for you! Keep smiling, everyone will wonder what you've been up to!
reply: Failing the hearing test three times doesn't give you many options. It may depend on what you want to do in the Air Force. If good hearing is not crucial for the postion you are interested in, you may have a chance. Don't get your hopes up! I wish I had better news for you! Keep smiling, everyone will wonder what you've been up to!
title: HEARING TEST PROBLEMS-HELP!!

content: quote: Originally posted by KEITH9654: I have been trying to get in the Air Force for a few months. I have failed a hearing test in my left ear three times now. They have sent my papers to Texas to see if they can be signed off on- has anybody ever been through this and can give me a heads up if I will be able to get in the AIR FORCE? I am desperate- please help!! I've been through that. Told the recruiter before my first physical I had an ear infection. Of course I did not pass it. Retook the physical 4 weeks later and passed the hearing test. You may want to see a your own doctor first to see what the problem may be. If you have had this problem for a long time, I don't know, does not sound good. No pun intended. Is this legal? I don't know,but its fun isn't?!

You may want to see a your own doctor first to see what the problem may be. If you have had this problem for a long time, I don't know, does not sound good. No pun intended. Is this legal? I don't know,but its fun isn't?!
